DOC.brief_summary: This study is a prospective, non-interventional, cross-sectional multicenter survey. The aim is to better understand the current therapy pattern for anemia in CKD treated with erythropoiesis-stimulating agents (ESAs) and not on-dialysis participant population in Israel. Participating physicians will be requested to interview eligible participants with CKD not on dialysis and to complete for them a satisfaction survey for anemia treatment. The survey will be completed twice, once at study start and once at six months' follow-up.
DOC.brief_title: Survey on Anemia Therapy in Participants With Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) Not on Dialysis
DOC.criteria: Adult participants with CKD Stage 35 Treated with ESAs Participant is speaking the same language as the investigator interviewer Past or current treatment with dialysis
